title: Lab Dashboard
description: Alerts and Flows from IDS Suricata; Logs from WordPress; Windows Event logs and Sysmon logs

queries.query: SELECT alert_severity as "x_axis_1", alert_category as "x_axis_2", alert_signature as "x_axis_3", count(_timestamp) as "y_axis_1"  FROM "suricata_alerts"  GROUP BY x_axis_1, x_axis_2, x_axis_3 ORDER BY x_axis_1 ASC, y_axis_1 DESC
SELECT src_ip as "x_axis_1", count(_timestamp) as "y_axis_1"  FROM "suricata_alerts"  GROUP BY x_axis_1 ORDER BY y_axis_1 DESC
SELECT dest_ip as "x_axis_1", count(_timestamp) as "y_axis_1"  FROM "suricata_alerts"  GROUP BY x_axis_1 ORDER BY y_axis_1 DESC
SELECT alert_severity as "x_axis_1", count(alert_severity) as "y_axis_1"  FROM "suricata_alerts"  GROUP BY x_axis_1 ORDER BY x_axis_1 ASC
SELECT histogram(_timestamp) as "x_axis_1", alert_signature as "x_axis_2", count(_timestamp) as "y_axis_1"  FROM "suricata_alerts"  GROUP BY x_axis_1, x_axis_2 ORDER BY x_axis_1 ASC

SELECT _timestamp as "x_axis_1", alert_signature as "x_axis_2", src_ip as "x_axis_3", src_port as "x_axis_4", dest_ip as "x_axis_5", dest_port as "x_axis_6", proto as "x_axis_7", app_proto as "x_axis_8", http_hostname as "x_axis_9", http_url as "x_axis_10", http_http_method as "x_axis_11", http_status as "x_axis_12", http_length as "x_axis_13", http_http_user_agent as "x_axis_14"  FROM "suricata_alerts"  GROUP BY x_axis_1, x_axis_2, x_axis_3, x_axis_4, x_axis_5, x_axis_6, x_axis_7, x_axis_8, x_axis_9, x_axis_10, x_axis_11, x_axis_12, x_axis_13, x_axis_14 ORDER BY x_axis_1 DESC
SELECT src_ip as "x_axis_1", sum(flow_bytes_toserver) as "y_axis_1"  FROM "suricata_flows"  GROUP BY x_axis_1 ORDER BY y_axis_1 DESC
SELECT dest_ip as "x_axis_1", sum(flow_bytes_toclient) as "y_axis_1"  FROM "suricata_flows"  GROUP BY x_axis_1 ORDER BY y_axis_1 DESC

SELECT _timestamp as "x_axis_1", src_ip as "x_axis_2", src_port as "x_axis_3", dest_ip as "x_axis_4", dest_port as "x_axis_5", proto as "x_axis_6", flow_bytes_toclient as "x_axis_7", flow_bytes_toserver as "x_axis_8", flow_pkts_toclient as "x_axis_9", flow_pkts_toserver as "x_axis_10", flow_age as "x_axis_11", flow_start as "x_axis_12", flow_end as "x_axis_13", flow_alerted as "x_axis_14", tcp_tcp_flags_tc as "x_axis_15", tcp_tcp_flags_ts as "x_axis_16", flow_reason as "x_axis_17", flow_state as "x_axis_18"  FROM "suricata_flows"  GROUP BY x_axis_1, x_axis_2, x_axis_3, x_axis_4, x_axis_5, x_axis_6, x_axis_7, x_axis_8, x_axis_9, x_axis_10, x_axis_11, x_axis_12, x_axis_13, x_axis_14, x_axis_15, x_axis_16, x_axis_17, x_axis_18 ORDER BY x_axis_1 DESC
SELECT histogram(_timestamp) as "x_axis_1", sum(flow_bytes_toclient) as "y_axis_1", sum(flow_bytes_toserver) as "y_axis_2"  FROM "suricata_flows"  GROUP BY x_axis_1 ORDER BY x_axis_1 ASC
SELECT cast(src_port as text) as "x_axis_2", sum(flow_bytes_toserver) as "y_axis_1"  FROM "suricata_flows"  GROUP BY x_axis_2 ORDER BY y_axis_1 DESC
SELECT cast(dest_port as text) as "x_axis_1", sum(flow_bytes_toclient) as "y_axis_1"  FROM "suricata_flows"  GROUP BY x_axis_1 ORDER BY y_axis_1 DESC
SELECT histogram(_timestamp) as "x_axis_1", code as "x_axis_2", count(code) as "y_axis_1"  FROM "web"  GROUP BY x_axis_1, x_axis_2 ORDER BY x_axis_1 ASC
SELECT code as "x_axis_1", count(code) as "y_axis_1"  FROM "web"  GROUP BY x_axis_1
SELECT host as "x_axis_1", count(host) as "y_axis_1"  FROM "web"  GROUP BY x_axis_1
SELECT path as "x_axis_1", count(path) as "y_axis_1"  FROM "web"  GROUP BY x_axis_1 ORDER BY y_axis_1 DESC
SELECT agent as "x_axis_1", count(agent) as "y_axis_1"  FROM "web"  GROUP BY x_axis_1 ORDER BY y_axis_1 DESC
SELECT code as "x_axis_1", method as "y_axis_1", count(code) as "z_axis_1"  FROM "web"  GROUP BY x_axis_1, y_axis_1 ORDER BY x_axis_1 ASC, y_axis_1 ASC
SELECT system_provider__name as "x_axis_1", count(system_provider__name) as "y_axis_1"  FROM "windows"  GROUP BY x_axis_1 ORDER BY y_axis_1 DESC
SELECT system_channel as "x_axis_1", count(system_channel) as "y_axis_1"  FROM "windows"  GROUP BY x_axis_1 ORDER BY y_axis_1 DESC
SELECT system_computer as "x_axis_1", count(system_computer) as "y_axis_1"  FROM "windows"  GROUP BY x_axis_1 ORDER BY y_axis_1 DESC

SELECT system_computer as "x_axis_1", data_targetusername as "x_axis_2", count(_timestamp) as "y_axis_1"  FROM "windows" WHERE system_channel IN ('Security') AND system_eventid IN ('4624') GROUP BY x_axis_1, x_axis_2 ORDER BY y_axis_1 DESC

SELECT system_computer as "x_axis_1", data_newprocessname as "x_axis_2", count(_timestamp) as "y_axis_1"  FROM "windows" WHERE system_channel IN ('Security') AND system_eventid IN ('4688') GROUP BY x_axis_1, x_axis_2 ORDER BY y_axis_1 DESC
SELECT system_eventid as "x_axis_1", count(system_eventid) as "y_axis_1"  FROM "windows" WHERE system_channel IN ('Microsoft-Windows-Sysmon/Operational') GROUP BY x_axis_1 ORDER BY x_axis_1 ASC

SELECT system_computer as "x_axis_1", data_image as "x_axis_2", data_destinationip as "x_axis_3", data_destinationport as "x_axis_4", data_destinationhostname as "x_axis_5", count(_timestamp) as "y_axis_1"  FROM "windows" WHERE system_channel IN ('Microsoft-Windows-Sysmon/Operational') AND system_eventid IN ('3') GROUP BY x_axis_1, x_axis_2, x_axis_3, x_axis_4, x_axis_5 ORDER BY y_axis_1 DESC

SELECT system_computer as "x_axis_1", data_image as "x_axis_2", data_queryname as "x_axis_3", count(_timestamp) as "y_axis_1"  FROM "windows" WHERE system_channel IN ('Microsoft-Windows-Sysmon/Operational') AND system_eventid IN ('22') GROUP BY x_axis_1, x_axis_2, x_axis_3 ORDER BY y_axis_1 DESC

SELECT system_computer as "x_axis_1", data_image as "x_axis_3", count(_timestamp) as "y_axis_1"  FROM "windows" WHERE system_channel IN ('Microsoft-Windows-Sysmon/Operational') AND system_eventid IN ('1') GROUP BY x_axis_1, x_axis_3 ORDER BY y_axis_1 DESC
